content.legion: Chance for attack to deal increased %Damage

innerAbility.name: For Bossing
abilities: Damage to Abnormal Status +8% OR Chance to Skip Cooldown +10%

details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Resistance' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 and talk to Belle in the Secret Plaza when prompt with choosing a class

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/double-jump.png} tip={Double Jump}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/resistance-auto-crank.png} tip={Resistance Auto Crank}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/natures-wrath.png} tip={Nature's Wrath}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/double-shot.png} tip={Double Shot}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/jaguar-mastery.png} tip={Jaguar Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/crossbow-mastery.png} tip={Crossbow Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/crossbow-acceleration.png} tip={Crossbow Acceleration}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/call-of-the-wild.png} tip={Call of the Wild}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/soul-arrow.png} tip={Soul Arrow: Crossbow}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/triple-shot.png} tip={Triple Shot}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/jaguar-link.png} tip={Jaguar Link}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/backstep.png} tip={Backstep}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/flurry.png} tip={Flurry}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/feline-berserk.png} tip={Feline Berserk}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/hunting-assistant-unit.png} tip={Hunting Assistant Unit}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/enduring-fire.png} tip={Enduring Fire}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/white-heat-rush.png} tip={White Heat Rush}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-instinct.png} tip={Wild Instinct}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/extended-magazine.png} tip={Extended Magazine}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/crossbow-expert.png} tip={Crossbow Expert}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/advanced-final-attack.png} tip={Advanced Final Attack}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/natural-force.png} tip={Natural Force}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/drill-salvo.png} tip={Drill Salvo}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/feline-berserk-reinforce.png} tip={Feline Berserk - Reinforce}> Feline Berserk - Reinforce_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar-reinforce.png} tip={Summon Jaguar - Reinforce}> Summon Jaguar - Reinforce_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast-reinforce.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast - Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast-boss-rush.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast - Boss Rush}> Wild Arrow Blast - Reinforce and Boss Rush_>[Choices for Last Point]<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Summon Jaguar - Cooldown Cutter}> Summon Jaguar - Cooldown Cutter_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar-enhance.png} tip={Summon Jaguar - Enhance}> Summon Jaguar - Enhance_>

nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type P (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar.png} tip={Summon Jaguar and Another Bite (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/exploding-arrows.png} tip={Exploding Arrows and Jaguar Rampage (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/sonic-roar.png} tip={Sonic Roar and Jaguar Soul (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/swipe.png} tip={Swipe (1st Job)}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/dash-n-slash.png} tip={Dash 'n Slash and White Heat Rush (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/hunting-assistant-unit.png} tip={Hunting Assistant Unit (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/drill-salvo.png} tip={Drill Salvo (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/double-shot.png} tip={Double Shot/Triple Shot/Enduring Fire (1st Job / 2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar.png} tip={Summon Jaguar and Another Bite (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/swipe.png} tip={Swipe (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/dash-n-slash.png} tip={Dash 'n Slash and White Heat Rush (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/hunting-assistant-unit.png} tip={Hunting Assistant Unit (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/sonic-roar.png} tip={Sonic Roar and Jaguar Soul (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type P (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/drill-salvo.png} tip={Drill Salvo (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/exploding-arrows.png} tip={Exploding Arrows and Jaguar Rampage (Hyper Skill)}>

credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Turn invisible preventing touch damage

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Capture
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, can capture up to 5 types of monsters\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to capture a monster which you can then summon to fight for you
details: Monsters can be captured after their HP falls below 90%
This skill is used to capture Jaguars that can be used as mounts

primary.name: Call of the Hunter
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, summons a monster for 60 sec\nThe monster attacks with 200% + 1% per monster level damage every 2 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to randomly summon a monster you've captured (aside from a Jaguar)

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/16/End_of_Special_Training} title={"End of Special Training"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Fire two arrows but only hits one enemy

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 22, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 80%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 2, Number of Bullets: 2
primary.desc: Fire two arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierces and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: Graviboots
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/double-jump.png} tip={Double Jump (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Jaguar Rider
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Speed While Riding: 40, Knockback Resistance: +50%\nCooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: Mount onto your Jaguar for mounted attacks
details: Increases your Movement Speed, %Knockback Resistance while riding

primary.name: Summon Jaguar
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage of Summoned Jaguar: 170%. Debuff Chance: 15%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 20 sec
Another Bite: [Final Attack Type Skill] Crossbow-Type Skills - Damage against Debuffed Enemies: 70%.
Cooldown: 1 sec.
[Passive Effect - Critical Damage of Summoned Jaguar: +8%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30
primary.desc: Summon your Jaguar to fight with you
details: [Final Attack Debuff]: When Jaguar attacks, there is a chance to apply a stacking debuff called "Another Bite" that causes Crossbow skills to deal an extra attack
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage and Abnormal Status Resistance
If your Jaguar is already summoned, you can use this skill again to mount onto it
While summoned, pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together fixes Jaguar in place and attacks nearby enemies
Prioritizes bosses with highest HP within range first

primary.name: Swipe
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 4.
Debuff Chance when attacking an enemy without Another Bite Debuff: 100%, Bonus Another Bite Debuff Chance: 30%.
Recover 7% of Max HP when attacking.
Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Command your Jaguar to swipe at enemies in front of you and applying the debuff "Another Bite"
details: [Note]: Jaguar skills can only be used while unmounted
If Swipe lands, heal some %Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Wild Lure
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Taunt Duration: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Provokes enemies to attack your Jaguar

primary.name: Resistance Auto Crank
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Crossbow Skill Attack Range: +50, Jump: +20, Speed: +40

primary.name: Nature's Wrath
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +25%

primary.name: Jaguar Management
primary.shortDesc: Manage captured Jaguars using the mouse.
primary.desc: Opens a UI that shows all your captured Jaguars
details: Special Jaguars captured give bonus stats
Snow White and Onyx Jaguar bonus stats do not stack

primary.name: Triple Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 290%
primary.desc: Fire three arrows but only hits one enemy

primary.name: Triple Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 290%
primary.desc: Fire three arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierces and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range

primary.name: Dash 'n Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 225% + (1% x Character Level), Number of Attacks: 2, Chance to Stun: 100%, Stun Duration: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Dash forward dealing damage to multiple enemies and also stuns enemies

primary.name: Dash 'n Slash
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 285%, Number of Attacks: 2, Stun Chance: 100% for 3 sec.
Debuff Chance when attacking an enemy without Another Bite Debuff: 100%, Bonus Another Bite Debuff Chance: 80%.
Cooldown: 7 sec
[Passive Effect - Summon Jaguar and Swipe Damage: +30% points, Another Bite Damage: +15% points]
primary.desc: Jaguar dashes forward pushing enemies and dealing damage to them. Also stuns and has a chance to apply a stack of "Another Bite"
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar.png} tip={Summon Jaguar (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/swipe.png} tip={Swipe (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Right-clicking the skill will turn a function ON/OFF where Jaguar will dash in place without moving forward when using this skill

primary.name: Crossbow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +50%, Damage: +10%

primary.name: Soul Arrow: Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power +20. Allows you to attack without consuming arrows.
details: Uses the arrow with the highest Attack to calculate your damage

primary.name: Call of the Wild
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 300 sec, Party Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%\n[Passive Effect: Damage Taken: -15%, Bonus Avoidability: +15%, Max MP: +15%]
primary.desc: Increases %Attack and %Magic Attack
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage Reduction, %Avoidability, and %Max MP

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% Final Attack damage.
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Jaguar Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Crossbow Acceleration
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages) and grants flat DEX

primary.name: Enduring Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Fire five arrows but only hits one enemy

primary.name: Enduring Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 40, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 115%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 2, Number of Bullets: 5
primary.desc: Fire five arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierce and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range

primary.name: Sonic Roar
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 6.
Debuff Chance when attacking an enemy without Another Bite Debuff: 100%, Bonus Another Bite Debuff Chance: 40%.
Cooldown: 6 sec
[Passive Effect - Summon Jaguar, Swipe, and Dash 'n Slash Damage: +40%p, Another Bite Damage: +15p]
primary.desc: Jaguar roars creating a shockwave that damages multiple enemies and has a chance to apply a stack of "Another Bite"
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar.png} tip={Summon Jaguar (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/swipe.png} tip={Swipe (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/dash-n-slash.png} tip={Dash 'n Slash (2nd Job)}> and "Another Bite" debuff by a flat amount
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: White Heat Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1200%
primary.desc: Dash diagonally in the direction of the Arrow Key pressed and push enemies away
details: When unmounted, pressing the Attack Key and Skill Key together performs an a diagonal dash<bp_Right-clicking the skill toggles a function ON/OFF to perform the diagonal dash by pressing only the Skill Key while unmounted_>

primary.name: Hunting Assistant Unit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, Duration: 60 sec, Attack Duration: 5 sec, Reload time: 2 sec, Number of Enemies: 8, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Deploy a turret fires arrows in a small circle in intervals
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Feline Berserk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 130, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec.\nCooldown: 70 sec.\n[Passive Effects - Attack Power: +20%, Final Damage: +10%, Speed: +15, Max Movement Speed: 20, Attack Speed: +1, Max HP: +50%]
primary.desc: Upon use, become invincible for a brief period
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Attack, %Final Damage, Attack Speed (by 1 stage), %Max HP, Movement Speed, and Max Movement Speed
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Flurry
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity: +40, Dodge Chance: 40%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be criticals.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Whenever you dodge an attack, all your attacks will be Critical Hits briefly
Additionally, grants flat DEX

primary.name: Jaguar Link
primary.shortDesc: Each Captured Jaguar - Critical Rate: +3%, Critical Damage: +2%, Max Number of Jaguars: 6, Attack Power: +10
primary.desc: For each captured Jaguar, gain %Crit Chance, %Crit Damage and Attack

primary.name: Backstep
primary.shortDesc: While activated, your Jaguar is able to attack while walking backwards.\n[Passive Effect: Damage Taken: -20%]
primary.desc: While toggled, walk backward without changing directions
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Wild Arrow Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 13, Damage per arrow: 370%, Speed during casting: 140, Boss Monster Damage: +10%
primary.desc: Continuously fire arrows but attacks only hits one enemy
details: Deals increased %Damage to bosses
Can move and jump while casting
Prioritizes bosses with highest HP within range first

primary.name: Wild Arrow Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 13, Max Enemies Hit (per shot): 8, Damage: 185%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 2\nGrenade: attacks up to 3 enemies for 655% damage 2 times. Cooldown: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Continuously fire arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierce and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range
details: Can move, jump, and use <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/graviboots.png} tip={Graviboots (1st Job)}> while casting
If the attack hits an enemy, a grenade will be fired towards enemies that were not initially hit

Right-clicking the skill will change the skill to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast-type-p.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast Type P (4th Job)}> that is only usable while mounted

primary.name: Wild Arrow Blast Type P
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nDamage Against Normal Monsters: +180%p
primary.desc: Fire an explosive blast forward
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Right-clicking the skill will change the skill back to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Jaguar Soul
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 12, Stun Chance: 100%, Duration: 10 sec, Stun Duration increased by up to 100% based on damage inflicted by Jaguar Soul
Another Bite Debuff Chance: 100%
Cooldown: 120 sec
[Passive Effect - Summon Jaguar, Swipe, Dash 'n Slash, and Sonic Roar Damage: +50%p, Another Bite Damage: +20%p]
primary.desc: Unleash a shockwave that binds the enemy with the highest HP and applies a stack of "Another Bite"
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/summon-jaguar.png} tip={Summon Jaguar (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/swipe.png} tip={Swipe (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/dash-n-slash.png} tip={Dash 'n Slash (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/sonic-roar.png} tip={Sonic Roar (3rd Job)}> and "Another Bite" debuff by a flat amount

primary.name: Drill Salvo

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Extended Magazine

primary.name: Crossbow Expert

primary.name: Wild Instinct

Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Natural Force
primary.shortDesc: Elemental Resistance: +30%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +15, Knockback Resistance: +50%

hyperActive.name: Jaguar Rampage
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 9. 100% Chance for Another Bite.\nCooldown: 12 sec\n[Passive Effect - Summon Jaguar, Swipe, Dash 'n Slash, Sonic Roar, and Jaguar Soul Damage: +150%p, Another Bite Damage: +40%p
hyperActive.desc: Jaguar dashes forward dealing damage and applying a stack of "Another Bite"

Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Jaguar Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, summons 7 jaguars from among the ones you've tamed (excluding your current jaguar) for 40 sec. Applies 90% Final Damage to the skills of summoned jaguars. While this skill is active, using the jaguar skill to attack will cause a 150% damage increase in Damage Against Normal Monsters and 50% increase in the debuff chance for Another Bite.
If the skill is activated with the down arrow key, only 3 jaguars will be summoned but their Final Damage will increase to 210%.
If you activate this skill again while it is active, your jaguars will be re-summoned to your location. Jaguars can be re-summoned once every 3 secs.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
[Passive Effect - ATT Power: +65]
fifthMain.desc: Summon additional Jaguars that you've captured to fight alongside you and can also use Jaguar Attacks
details: [Passive]: Permanenetly grants flat Attack

Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will instead summon fewer jaguars but their %Final Damage is increased<bp_Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the ability to trigger this effect by pressing only the Skill Key_>
While active, Jaguar Attacks gain increased %Damage against regular monsters and have a higher chance to apply "Another Bite"
While the skill is active, pressing the Skill Key will re-summon your jaguars to your location

fifthMain.name: Primal Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Grants invincibility for 11 sec. [Primary Attack] Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 740%, Number of Attacks: 12. Primary attack occurs 9 times. [Final Attack] Activates a shock 4 time sthat unleashes 15 attacks for 990% damage. Shock has Critical Rate +100% and ignores 100% additional enemy Defense.
Final Attack can be triggered immediately by using the skill before the Primary Attacks are complete, and 100% chance for Another Bite debuff to be at max stack.
If not mounted, causes you to mount your jaguar. Invincible while mounting.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleash a devastating large area attack before dealing a final attack
details: You are invincible briefly after casting<bp_If not mounted when used, you will automatically mount and be invincible while mounting_>
Final attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit, has 100% Ignore DEF and applies max stacks of "Another Bite"
While active, pressing the Skill Key again will immediately trigger the final attack

fifthMain.name: Primal Grenade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, upon explosion deals Damage: 1320%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6
No casting action while Wild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type X is active.
1 grenade is prepared every 4.5 sec. Can have up to 8 grenades
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Launch grenades that detonate when it hits an enemy
details: If the grenade does not hit an enemy, it will bounce and detonate after a short delay

Can be used at the same time while casting <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast-type-p.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast Type P (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/wild-hunter/wild-arrow-blast-type-x.png} tip={Wild Arrow Blast Type X (5th Job)}>
1 grenade is prepared every 4.5 secs and you can hold up to 8 grenades at once
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Wild Arrow Blast Type X
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Key Down Duration: 5 sec, Frontal Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1205%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 7, Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Fire a continuous barrage of arrows forward
details: You can move while casting
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

notable.name: Wild Arrow Blast Type P - 4th Job

meta: Wild Hunter is a DEX archer class part of the Resistance. What is unique about Wild Hunter is that she can ride a jaguar into battle and also command it to attack alongside you
